lines.text:
[Rollie gets the drop on Mason after faking his own death]
What's the matter? Forget why you hired me?

[Rollie is riding in a backseat and realizes he's sitting on a plastic sheet.]
Why all the plastic?
I didn't want to get any stains on the seat.
What stains?

[points a gun at Rollie]
I'm sorry, Rollie. No loose ends.

[Mason grabs the Uzi Rollie has just set down]
In this hand is the ammo for the gun. And this is Krazy Glue. A thousand and one uses. Now, a thousand and two.
[shoves him out the front door]
Leo, you're not saying Tyler killed Ellen Keith, Adams, and DeFranco all in one night?
Hm. I don't believe it, either.

[holding a gun at the side of Rollie's head, calmly]
Hiya, Rollie. My name's Leo, and we need to talk.
How was I?
You were great. Nobody dies like you.
I've really admired your stuff since 'Vermin From Venus.'
You saw that?
Yeah.
That's the one that got him deported from Australia!
Nobody cares about making movies about people any more. All they care about is special effects.

[ironically]
I'm gonna cry.
Bok choi has great texture. Like alien flesh.
[Rollie finishes making a cast of DeFranco's head.]
Is that it?
We can do it again if you want to.
Huh. Wise guy.
How are you?
I've been better.

[Andy has used movie smoke bombs to help break Rollie's truck out of the police impound lot]
Jesus! What pots did you use?
The big ones!
I said Hellraisers, not Killer Smoke!

[Rollie has impersonated DeFranco to get his money out of a Swiss bank]
Well, I'm gonna miss the job, but this should ease the pain somewhat. Well, Rollie me boy, you'll never have to put that shit on your face again.
I don't know, Leo... it's hard for me to do anything else!

[pointing at one of Rollie's movie props]
'I Dismember Mama'.

[after Rollie has driven off without her]
They'll kill you! And if they don't, I will!
Took it like a man.
Murdoch, You're an asshole!
